titleStmt.title: A complaint against securitie in these perillous times: vvritten by M. Tho. Kingsmill, sometime fellow of Magdalen College in Oxford: and lately her Maiesties publicke professour of the Hebrew tongue, in the same Vniuersitie
titleStmt.author: Kingsmill, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
